numberBlocksForUserLimit.title: User Limit Date
numberBlocksForUserLimit.helperText: Set the deadline for new users, between the start date and the end date of the staking.
numberBlocksForUserLimit.active: Set the deadline for new users. If left inactive, there is no user limit.

poolLimitPerUser.label: Pool Limit per User
poolLimitPerUser.helperText: If set to 0, there is no limit to the amount of tokens a user can deposit.

notes.audit: It only takes 10 seconds to successfully initiate the staking process, with no need for manual intervention. After successful confirmation, stakes are automatically assigned to the creator/owner address. The staking system has no copyright restrictions, it is automatically deployed on the main network, and verified.
notes.note_creation: All tokens have been reviewed by the security audit company and have successfully passed the contract security audit.

error.title: Error Initializing Staking
error.max-start-block: The end date of reward must be after the start date
error.max-number-blocks-for-user-limit: You must define a block that is between the start block and the end block, with the condition (startBlock + numberBlocksForUserLimit) <= endBlock.
error.max-zero: The amount must be greater than zero
error.greater-than-zero: The reward must be greater than zero

alert.message: To create staking on the <primary><bold>{{network}} ({{slug}})</bold></primary> network, you need to switch to that network.

pool.title: STAKING POOLS
pool.subtitle: Earn passive income while you sleep

message.deposit: Tokens for staking have been successfully added.
message.updatePoolLimitPerUser: Pool token deposit limit per user updated successfully
message.updateStartAndEndBlocks: Staking start and end dates updated successfully

noteAPY: Calculated based on current rates and subject to changes according to various external variables. It's an approximate estimation provided for convenience purposes only and by no means represents guaranteed returns.

noResult.title: Oops, sorry!
noResult.subtitle: No matches found
noResult.description: You may not be on the correct network or no staking has been created

apy.info: Calculated based on current rates and subject to changes according to various external variables. It's an approximate estimation provided solely for informational purposes and by no means represents guaranteed returns.
apy.title: ROI Calculator

emergencyRewardWithdraw.title: Withdraw Reward Tokens
emergencyRewardWithdraw.subtitle: In this section, you can withdraw reward tokens by entering the amount

recoverToken.title: Recover Tokens
recoverToken.subtitle: In this section, you can recover tokens sent accidentally
recoverToken.helperText: To recover your token balance, enter the token address.

stopReward.title: Stop Staking
stopReward.subtitle: In this section, you can stop staking, halting the reward distribution

updateStartAndEndBlocks.title: Update Staking Start and End Dates
updateStartAndEndBlocks.subtitle: In this section, you can update the start and end dates of staking, and you can initialize staking again.

updateRewardPerBlock.title: Update Reward per Block
updateRewardPerBlock.subtitle: In this section, you can update the reward per block.

updatePoolLimitPerUser.title: Update Pool Limit per User
updatePoolLimitPerUser.subtitle: In this section, you can update the amount of tokens a user can deposit. If set to 0, there is no token limit.
